key_risks: Privacy and ethical concerns related to automated traffic enforcement systems
Regulatory and legal challenges, including a $1.3 million settlement and ongoing securities investigation
Dependence on government contracts, making revenue vulnerable to policy changes and budget constraints
Public resistance and controversy over automated enforcement systems
controversies: Whistleblower lawsuit alleging overbilling by a subsidiary
Securities investigation into allegations of materially misleading business information
Public and legal challenges in regions like Florida and New York regarding traffic-safety enforcement
social_issues: Privacy concerns over the collection and use of driver data
Public resistance to AI-driven surveillance technologies
governance_issues: Legal issues and settlements impacting corporate governance
Regulatory scrutiny and compliance risks in a highly regulated industry
